name: The Book of Unwritten Tales: The Critter Chronicles

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Book of Unwritten Tales - Critter Chronicles/CritterChronicles.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select gog setup exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Book of Unwritten Tales - Critter Chronicles/CritterChronicles.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /NOCANCEL /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
